price: 12. Nabiyow cus: munaafiqhiin kee sorkocôbaxittet biyak (iimaanak Ion agay-waaga kinnuk) kak yan mari Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nee elle xagnissem mali deedal kee duquurusiyya akke waytek iyyen waqdi.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ مَّا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِلَّا غُرُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yaqūlu al-munāfiqūna wa-alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun mā waʿadanā al-lahu warasūluhu illā ghurūran
